action_header: Header for the action buttons table column
allow_multiple_materials: Allows people to submit cuts with different materials but same name
allow_multiples: Allows people to submit different cuts with the same name
attr_edit_perms: The tags non-authenticated users are allowed to edit with the `attr` action.
auth_timeout: Timeout before authed user is deauthed
dev_log: Enable in-page dev log. Disabling redirects to standard console logging.
host: Automatically generated by default. The WebSockets backend address.
length_bounds: Maximum and minimum for the length of a job. Set either to -1 to disable that bound.
materials: An object of acceptable material codes and their names. See API.md for default material codes and names
metabump: Number of seconds before a metabump occurs. Set to 0 to disable.
name_header: Header for job name table column
pass_depth: How many jobs from the top are allowed to be passed off.
pass_hover: The hovertext for the pass button.
priorities: An array of priority names, from lowest to highest
priority_header: Header for priority column of table
priority_allow: Allow anyone to submit at any priority.
priority_thresh: Thresholds for bumping longer jobs down
recalc_priority: Whether to recalculate priority intelligently based on job length
recapitalize: When true, names get capitalized intelligently
reconnectRate: How frequenetly to try reconnecting to the backend when connection drops
refreshRate: How often to poll for new data.
send_notifications: Send notifications to the client whenever it causes an error on the backend
time_header: Header for time column in table
